comment.author: 39967544@N00
comment._content: The background shows that this series of photos was taken on No 2 or 3 Wharf at Circular Quay, not Garden Island. Wonderful image!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/39967544@N00] It is indeed, thank you FredV45! It was a 'citizens welcome canteen' held at the Orient Company's wharf at East Circular Quay. We will upload another image from the collection that gave us the clue to the event. Thanks for alerting us! :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
